assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Yunkang Group Limited operates as a medical operation service provider in China. It offers diagnostic outsourcing and diagnostic testing services, such as genetic reproduction tests and screening tests, COVID-19 and non-COVID-19 tests, diagnostic testing, pathology tests, personalized diagnostic testing, medical report consultation, hospital referral, and health management services; infectious disease diagnostic tests, including hepatitis B virus, tuberculosis, human papillomavirus, EB virus, rabies virus, and nucleic acid tests for respiratory pathogens; and routine diagnostic tests for chronic kidney disease, blood disease, autoimmune disease, and endocrine metabolism disease. The company also provides technical support for the set-up and daily operation of the on-site diagnostic centers, which include setting up or upgrading diagnostic centers, the establishment of standard operating procedures for diagnostic testing, diagnostic consultation and staff training, provision of equipment, smart internet of things, and logistics assistance; and medical consultation services. It offers its services through independent clinical laboratories and on-site diagnostic centers. As of December 31, 2021, the company had six laboratories located in Guangzhou, Chengdu, Shanghai, Hefei, Kunming, and Nanchang. It serves hospitals, community health clinics and other medical institutions, financial institutions, and insurance companies. Yunkang Group Limited was founded in 2008 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
